name: BrainPickersGuessTheMovie
0:
”Alexa, let's play guess the movie”
”give me another clue”
”I give up”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: guess the movie
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Try to guess the movie I'm thinking about from the clues I give you (for devices with displays you get a picture and letters revealed from the movie too!).

This release from the BrainPickers! Guess series brings you hundreds of the most popular movies in the world, each with 5 tailored clues (and a pixelated image) to help you to guess.

A fast paced, entertaining game to pass time by yourself or with friends/family!

***PREMIUM***
- Increase variety and shuffle the available movie collection with up to four additional randomized packs of movies.
